Character

Class Wizard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Character.Character
      • Character.Wizard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Armor, Weapon

    public class Wizard
extends Character
implements Weapon, Armor
    The Wizard class extends Character, adding two new instance variables: maxmagic, and currentmagic, as well as the castLightningBolt() and castHeal() methods, which represent casting magic spells.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class Character.Character

        currentLife, dexterity, dice, intelligence, maxLife, name, strength

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Wizard(java.lang.String n, int s, int d, int i)
      The Wizard(String,int,int,int) constructor overrides the constructor with the same signature in Character.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int attack()
      Returns a random die roll using the roll method in the Dice.java, *modified by the character's strength
      int castHeal()
      castHeal() represents casting a magic spell.
      int castLightningBolt()
      castLightningBolt() represents casting a magic spell.
      int getCurrentMagic()
      Returns currentmagic
      int getMaxMagic()
      Returns maxmagic
      int useArmor()
      Returns a random die roll using the roll method in the Dice.java, *modified by the character's strength and uses that value in the heal method to heal the character
      int useWeapon()
      Returns a random die roll using the roll method in the Dice.java, *modified by the character's strength

      • Methods inherited from class Character.Character

        getCurrentLife, getDexterity, getIntelligence, getMaxLife, getName, getStrength, heal, wound

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Wizard

        public Wizard(java.lang.String n,
      int s,
      int d,
      int i)
        The Wizard(String,int,int,int) constructor overrides the constructor with the same signature in Character. It first calls that constructor using the super keyword, then initializes maxmagic to a value, and sets currentmagic to the same value, similar to lifepoints.
        Parameters:
        n - name
        s - strength
        d - dexterity
        i - intelligence

    • Method Detail

      • castLightningBolt

        public int castLightningBolt()
        castLightningBolt() represents casting a magic spell. The method first checks that currentmagic is greater than/equal to 5. If it is, currentmagic is reduced by 5 and a random number is returned using the dice inherited from Character, modified by the character's intelligence. Otherwise, returns 0.
        Returns:
        integer representing cast lightning bold damage

      • castHeal

        public int castHeal()
        castHeal() represents casting a magic spell. The method first checks that currentmagic is greater than/equal to 8. If it is, currentmagic is reduced by 8 and the character's heal() method is called with a random number, modified by the character's intelligence score. The amount healed is also returned by the method.
        Returns:
        integer representing cast heal amount

      • getMaxMagic

        public int getMaxMagic()
        Returns maxmagic
        Returns:
        integer representing max life

      • getCurrentMagic

        public int getCurrentMagic()
        Returns currentmagic
        Returns:
        integer representing current magic

      • attack

        public int attack()
        Returns a random die roll using the roll method in the Dice.java, *modified by the character's strength
        Specified by:
        attack in class Character
        Returns:
        integer representing attack damage

      • useWeapon

        public int useWeapon()
        Returns a random die roll using the roll method in the Dice.java, *modified by the character's strength
        Specified by:
        useWeapon in interface Weapon
        Returns:
        integer representing use weapon damage

      • useArmor

        public int useArmor()
        Returns a random die roll using the roll method in the Dice.java, *modified by the character's strength and uses that value in the heal method to heal the character
        Specified by:
        useArmor in interface Armor
        Returns:
        integer representing use armor amount
